mapper.select: /* [SQLID:app.menu.MenuMapper.selectMenu ]*/ with recursive search_menu(menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, route_name, level, path, cycle) as ( select g.menu_id, g.parent_id, g.menu_name, g.route_name, 1, array [g.menu_id], false from menu_table g where g.parent_id is null union all select g.menu_id, g.parent_id, g.menu_name, g.route_name, level + 1, path || g.menu_id, g.menu_id = any(path) from menu_table g, search_menu sb where g.parent_id = sb.menu_id and not cycle) select menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, route_name, level from search_menu order by path
